pages.text: This mod reworks the Phantom to be less tedious! Phantoms now only attack players who fly with an Elytra at night.

Be warned, these phantoms have new and improved abilities! Their bite will inflict the weighted effect, which amplifies the effects of gravity three fold!$(br)$(br)Trying to hide on land may prove even more treacherous, as the phantoms shriek will lure all nearby hostile mobs to your location.
